item.title: mxmCounter - A filesystem based hit counter product for Zope, CMF & Plone sites
item.description: mxm has just released version 1.0.0 of mxmCounter. It counts hits on webpages.

item.title: Issue dealer 0.9.22 released
item.description: A new version of the Issue Dealer has been released.

item.title: Nuxeo CPS 3.0 rc3 released
item.description: The hopefuly final release candidate before CPS 3.0 has been released. All the 355 unit tests are passing, of course, but there may be a few bugs left, so it's the last time for you to grab the tarball / zipball and test it (under Zope 2.6.1, 2.6.4 or 2.7.0) and report bugs (+ patches :) ) to the cps-devel mailing list (http://lists.nuxeo.com/mailman/listinfo/cps-devel).

item.title: Silva 0.9.3.3 released
item.description: Infrae has released Silva 0.9.3.3, a minor bugfix release for the Silva 0.9.3 line of development.

item.title: Zope 2.7.0 and products RPMs for RedHat
QuickLinks 0.1.8
item.description: QuickLinks 0.1.8 is a tiny but useful patch to the Zope management interface.

item.title: Pan European Portals Conference 2004
item.description: The call for speakers is now open
